Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone with Cricket service and it is amazing!  It is super fast, easy to use and best of all it supports flash.  It also has an amazing 8 mp rear camera with flash and a forward facing camera for video chat and easy self portraits!  After owning this phone I have absolutely no desire for an IPhone or any other overpriced phone.  I get great service, this is a premium phone and it is a great price for $199 LOVE IT!!!  Oh yeah, and the voice searching features are 100% EVERY TIME!

Reviews.Title: Pretty fantastic phone, BUT there is one issue...
Reviews.Author: Joshua L. Coleman
Reviews.Content: ...this phone is fantastic.  It's fast; faster than, or at least equal to, an iPhone.  I'm not an Apple fanboi, so I wanted a smartphone that ran Android and had decent speed.  I also didn't want to pay $130 to a 'contract' based service, for one month of phone service.  That was just outrageous.  SO, I went with this phone, the Huawei Mercury M886.  (I often joke with friends that the name of the company that makes it, Huawei, is pronounced to sound like "Who are we??"...a little tongue-in-cheek. I know it's not actually pronounced like that, but it's still amusing.)  They also make Cricket's other popular phones, the Ascend and Ascend II.  The Mercury though, seems to be their premiere and fastest smartphone, and as I've stated, it works great, except for one thing.Now for the issue:  The battery life is really not anywhere near what it states.  If you were consistently talking, I would estimate you'd get about 4 hours of actual talk time.  And that would be starting with a 100% charge.  And 380 hours of standby time?  NO WAY.  That's 15...almost 16 days.  I'd give it a maximum of TWO days....and that's with nothing enabled!  With things like 3G or WiFi and GPS on, you need to charge it every day.  Now, admittedly, I have the battery the phone came with.  There is an extended battery available, and in the past, I have almost always bought the extended battery.  The only problem?  Nothing fits when you have an extended battery, because the bigger battery requires a new door and a new case.  So any accessories that are available for the phone no longer fit, because nothing is designed with the extended battery in mind.  However, if you can get over that, I would so go ahead and grab the extended battery...it'll about double your time between charges.  Otherwise, carry a micro-usb cable with you, because this phone will need it.  You can hook it up to a computer USB port, or its own charger power cord.  A car charger is a good option if you spend lots of time in your car, just make sure to get a Huawei official charger, as it tends to not charge with third party chargers.  It's quite power hungry, but aside from that, it's truly a great phone.  I give it four stars out of five.  For the fifth star, they'd have to rework the battery system.  A 1950 MaH battery is just not enough.

Reviews.Title: $800 smartphone for under $200!
Reviews.Author: Dr. M. A. Dixon "hyper-observant"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful fast android smartphone that ATT, Verizon, TMobile, etc would charge you $800 for unless you sign up for a 2-year contract and then they would give you the $199 price. Cricket is month-to-month with no contract and charges less than these other carriers per month as well as not charging you an extra $600 for buying a phone without the contract! Way to go Cricket! This is such a beautiful fast powerful phone too!; way to go Huawei!

Reviews.Title: Solid Android Phone!
Reviews.Author: Perry Y. Bush "MrMercury"
Reviews.Content: The title says it all!Very good batt life (for a smartphone ... compares with iphone 4s, which I have owned), external speaker, display, camera, very fast processor 1.4 gz single core, ... etc.Only prob ... must turn off wi-fi to send mms ... that means if you want send a pict via texting app turn off wi-fi. MMS used to work properly until Cricket broke it with an update. NOTE: this does not affect sms (regular texting).Also, if you need use the GPS, wi-fi must be off (this is the default behavior). The GPS on this phone works extremely well with the google maps and google navigation apps. It connects almost instantly everytime I use it.I am very please with the phone ... it is the best smartphone for the money, period!If you are an Andriod fan, you won't be disappointed!BTW ... This phone out the box does not play all video formats. To remedy this go to the google play app store and get "MX Player". It's free and plays anything I throw at it flawlessly.One other thing ... the memory is built in, 2GB. If you don't have alot of picts & music this will be fine. Otherwise, you can get a 8GB Micro SD card for less than 10 bucks online here at amazon. Look at the phone manual how to remove the back cover and insert it. Now you will have two different storage areas on the phone, but your picts & music will still show even if you have some stored on one, and some stored on the other.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and excellent value
Reviews.Author: Like Lincoln
Reviews.Content: This is truly a great phone and with Cricket's 'no contract' I have the freedom that I want.  It is exceptionally fast. The screen quality is sharp and clear.  The sound is great - love to listen to Pandora on it.  Software upgrades pushed out this summer increased the battery life and made its operation even more smooth.  It is just a super package.  I couldn't be more pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Best phone for the money you can get PERIOD
Reviews.Author: Chad W. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I know one of the other reviewers already said this, but this really is an $800 phone for under $200. Just compare the specs to phones made by Samsung, HTC, and Motorola that sell for 3 to 4 times as much retail! It makes me wonder how high the profit margin is with these other companies. Take the HTC One V for example, has a much slower processor and less battery life than the Mercury, and those are selling for $300 here on Amazon. Btw I'm not sure why Amazon specs saying this phone has HD video camera. It has a sweet camera and very high quality video, but I don't see an option for HD anywhere in the settings on my Mercury. This is the best smartphone I have owned to date.

Reviews.Title: well pleased
Reviews.Author: daniel rayside
Reviews.Content: Grate phone execp for the porno vedio left on it. Staring maby the previous owner.grate entainment.real actors otherwise everything was grate

Reviews.Title: best cricket phone
Reviews.Author: cindyb
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone when it first came out for $250 and let me tell u is the best phone cricket has ever had. I've had it for a year know and drop it a couple times and still looks new but love the 8 pix HD camera good pic and video my sister has the htc something from tmobile and phone cost her $600 and does not take pic like mine. plus for those who love to watch nfl games like me i dont have to miss a game now just download espn app and watch it live on your phone. the only other phone cricket has a little better than mine is galaxy s 3.

Reviews.Title: luv it
Reviews.Author: vernev
Reviews.Content: since i was familiar with huawei m886, i replaced it when screen cracked.Saler was very fast n prompt. Ordered on Saturday, received on Tuesday.Pretty n white, looks just like an iphone for a fraction of the cost.

Reviews.Title: GREAT !!!
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: This phone is the best prepaid out. I would recommend this phone to anybody Its fast and the battery last for hours without charging. They have Outterbox cases so the phone wont break .... I have no issues at all just would update the software but  thats nothing big but I love this phone. I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Better than I anticipated
Reviews.Author: C. Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: Since the phone was from Cricket I didn't expect much, but have been pleasantly surprised. The phone is fast, data comes quickly, and the camera flash works very well. There is also a battery saving mode that can extend the battery life by hours. I am really happy with this phone.  **wait, the battery is extremely hard to change for me. I had to get a screwdriver and pry the back of the phone off. I already dented it a bit, and if I have to restart the phone it will be a problem, but, I bought a phone case and can look past the crazy adult-proof battery.

Reviews.Title: A defected phone..
Reviews.Author: B.j.904
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from Amazon in August of 2012..I paid an overall of 241.00 dollars on the phone and everysince I had the phone it overheats...So all of a sudden 3 months after having the phone it overheated and stopped working..Now I cant even return the phone...

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD PHONE !!!
Reviews.Author: Tater
Reviews.Content: I just got this phone a week ago,and I have to say.this phone is great.its very fast and responcive.the screen is very bright and the camera takes very good pictures for a phone camera.but best of all,is the wireless mobile hot spot that this phone has,it works great... for 150 bucks you cant beat it lol....And with the monthly no contract bill being only 60 per month "unlimitled everything"and mobile hot spot,HOW DOES AT&T; and other places stay in business with $100 plus phone bills?im saving $900 a year using cricket no contract service.thats alot lmao !!!! VERY GOOD PHONE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone. I love Muve Music :D. I use to have the Samsung vitalty. Which it sucks, freeze on me, and not much memory. The camera and video is perfect. The front camera is not that great. Its ok though, but the back camera with a 8MP and flash is good. Sometimes depends on the lighting it can take great ones and not so great. The processor is good. 1.4 Ghz. It Not bad. Its fast. Its one of the best cricket phone have so far. Close to the contracts phones. Overall its a good phone and do recommend!!! :)

Reviews.Title: Good starter phone for someone new to android.
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived early. Worked right out of the box but I did charge and it is recommended by the manufacture. Phone  responded relatively fast. Just a bit small for my big hands but it was not bought for me. The end user is extremely happy. And the phone fit his budget. And filled the other needs like company he needed to stay with cricket. I did the set up and found it simple and easy. The battery lasted quite some time as I h sad it for a week before handing it over to the end owner.  I did run it through the mill of torture and the phone responded better than expected. For the price the phone is great. If you are with a different carrier there are much better choices.  But for cricket and under 75.00 bucks there was no better choice at the time I ordered it.

Reviews.Title: Huawei Mercury
Reviews.Author: Alphea Rooks
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this phone. It just doesn't hold a charge long. Overall a very good phone to have.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: isaac
Reviews.Content: Phone works great, its sealed in original packaging, so dont be turned away by the pic, it will be in original packaging sealed unopened

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Avery Hunter-Brooks
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome from the camera to its GPS.....Especially for its price. Picture are "Picture Perfected". However the microphone is pretty bad. Navigation and Map apps are extremely help and on point. Battery life is reasonable as long as you are (Which means don't expected long battery hour if u open multiple apps and use your phone all the time.) It is a great phone for teens and younger!

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Anon
Reviews.Content: no problems at all. i got it for cheaper on the "used" section and it works perfectly fine. no scratches or anything. Connected it to Cricket myself over the computer and had it working with line service within 10min.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Latoya
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new phone but I didn't want to go to the Cricket store to pay a boat loat of money. Well the person who sold me this online saved me. It was cheaper than buying from the Cricket store and when I recieved it, it was in brand new box with all the parts as it would from getting it from the store. I'm actually using the phone to write this review so I love it! *two thumbs up*

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Dave Dahlberg
Reviews.Content: Cricket no longer carries this phone and I don't know why. It a very good phone at an even better price. It does everything I want in a phone and more.

Reviews.Title: Hauwei Mercury
Reviews.Author: Guadalupe
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone worked very well and I love it. It also shipped here on time and everything. I would defiantly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: My first Smartphone
Reviews.Author: avidreader
Reviews.Content: Having done extensive research before my purchase, led me to this product.  It has been what I was hoping it would be.  The price had a fair amount of importance in the decision and I feel that I have gotten my moneys worth and more. I would purchase another product from this manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: LaVaughn D Powers
Reviews.Content: Sleek, and has all the bells and whistles that I was asking for.  Especially love the camera.  It's a good investment.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: Cassandra R. Lozano
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best pre-paid cell phone out there right now, would recommend this to someone who wants to own a pre-paid phone with no contract. I love the look and feel of the phone, it also has a big beautiful & shiny screen.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Chiqiton
Reviews.Content: I have the white version of this phone, I love this phone. It's super fast, it takes beautiful HD pics and videos, the MuveMusic app is so awesome and plus it's free. Dolby sound, an LED light on the front that turns into different colors depending on the notification you have, a phone like no other!!! A really unique phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the money!
Reviews.Author: thbaz
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone from cricket for $249 a couple months ago and it was well worth it. its an excellent phone its no s3 or one x but it's no push over either I would recommend this phone to anyone. I didn't buy this phone from amazon i got it from cricket and I heard they stop selling them so if ur gonna get one get it quick.

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: CHEZ TYLER BENNION
Reviews.Content: well it my first android phone so i think its freakn awesome. but because its my first dont take my word for it.

Reviews.Title: Ripp off company
Reviews.Author: Dennis Kenney "DJ"
Reviews.Content: Daughter bought their moxt expensive phone which broke in under a year. They said they would repair but came up with excuses when she got to the store. And you know how hard it is to call this company for help. Wasted her time and ripped her off. In my opion, the worst cell phone company, service and products.

Reviews.Title: great phone great price
Reviews.Author: Steven A. Keene
Reviews.Content: the phone is fast and has double touch. you can pinch zoom. the phone has a 8mp camera on the back and a vga camera on the front for web chating. plus muve music unlimited music downloads with 3gb of storage. I have had the phone for almost a month with no problems.

Reviews.Title: mislead
Reviews.Author: Nixon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone with the impression that it was a brand new phone. When I tried to activate it for cricket, they told me that there records show them that it is a used device. I was deceived and mislead. However, the condition of the phone was great and works good. So, what more could you ask for??

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Green Angeledes
Reviews.Content: this is an easy to use phone,  the battery lasts a good long time  Cricket prepaid  phone ,text, and web browsing is cheap and fast

Reviews.Title: es excelente pero no puedo utilizarlo aca
Reviews.Author: Bertha de Machado
Reviews.Content: good the phone is inoperable serial here apparently does not appear in the inventory there will be some solution movilne

Reviews.Title: good for a few months
Reviews.Author: jared
Reviews.Content: i purchased this phone as my first smartphone having had a android tablet and wanted a android phone and right out the box it worked great and flawlessly but isnt that how all products are? after about a month i had to restart it about twice a day to clear up the lag and the wifi shutuoffs, then my signal would cut off and i had to restart it for that too. the touchscreen isnt always pinpoint accurate on what you press and doesnt pick up some of the time. the android version on this phone is still 2.3 as of november first and has not received the ice cream sandwich update yet, it doesnt fix simple typed errors like a iphone and cannot space words like a iphone. if you love have the newest android version do not buy this phone and if you want a cheap phone with a few minor problems then choose this one. battery life is very long for my light web browsing and random calls during the day and the camera isnt exactly 8mp as it says compared to other major brands

Reviews.Title: Better price at store
Reviews.Author: meli
Reviews.Content: They have the Mercury at a cricket store for ONLY 179.99 and it's brand new plus you save 13.50 off your bill if you are receiving any government assistance in Oregon.
